nodeName.description: arbitrary name of the node for usage by the scripts to pinpoint format errors.

managedIdentityLocation.description: Selects the Managed Identity location for Policies with DeployIfnotExists and Modify effects.

parameters.description: Parameter values for the assignment. Specified parameters not defined in the assigned Policy or Initiative are silently ignored.

ignorebranch.description: Ignore the rest of the tee staring at this node. Can be used to define future assignments without deploying the assignments.

enforcementMode.description: Similar to ignoreBranch, it deploys the assignment and sets the assignment to Default or DoNotEnforce. DoNotEnforce allows a what if analysis.

initiativeName.description: policyName or initiativeName for the assignment. Should not be a fully qualified id

friendlyNameToDocumentIfGuid.description: purely used as a comment to make the JSON more readable if the name is a GUID (optional).

assignment.description: String values are concatenated in each branch. Assignment name lengths are limited to 24. Must exist at least once in every branch.
